#summary Introduction to pchart for mediawiki

=== What is pchart4mw ? ===
pchart4mw is a Mediawiki extension that enables you to create professional looking charts within a mediawiki page. With it you can create line-, bar-, pie-, radar-, scatter- and bubble charts.
